page.title: 09LEWES STABLES
page.content: There are 5 Stables in and about LEWES. Here is a list ,{1.THE WALLOW {2.THE NUNNERY 3.MASSONS 4.LEICESTER RD {STABLES 5.HOPE IN THE VALLEY.}THE WALLOW is A little Stable off the main road to BRIGHTON.The lady there has one horse and looks after another horse and donkey which she looks after separately.2.THE NUNNERY has six horses the lady there said that they have their shoes changed before and after a race and every month normally. 3.MASSONS has sixteen horses and they are washed and groomed every week.It takes approximately an hour according to its size.4.LEICESTER RD. stables has nine horses.They eat oats /barley /hay and glucose for a treat.5.HOPE IN THE VALLEY has eleven horses.They teach people how to ride there.{BY {AMBA SUPPEL/CLARE TURNER/SALLY BREEDS/ {FAYE WILLIS/EMMA NASH.
